alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Northern Cayuga; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 2:42PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW EAST OF LAKE ONTARIO WILL MOVE SOUTHWARD THROUGH 400 PM... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 2 inches per hour. Winds gusting to 45 mph will result in areas of blowing snow. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 237 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was across Oswego County extending eastward across southern Lewis County. This band will drift southward across southern Oswego County and northern Cayuga counties through 400 PM EST. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Fulton, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Lowville, Pulaski, Central Square, Redfield, Selkirk Shores State Park, Highmarket, Mexico Point State Park, Nine Mile Point, Battle Island State Park, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Hastings, Scriba, Volney, Richland, Palermo and Sterling. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 33 and 38. SAFETY INFO... Traveling through this band will be extremely difficult, with near whiteout conditions. Avoid travel during this time if at all possible. If you must travel, slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
